import { useState } from 'react' import AthleteModal from './AthleteModal' export default function AthleteCard({fighter}) { const [open, setOpen] = useState(true) const cancelButtonRef = useRef(null) return (

{fighter.first_name} {fighter.last_name}

{fighter.wins}-{fighter.losses}-{fighter.draw}

{/*

{fighter.losses}

*/}
)}
